class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        record=set(list(range(n)))
        diff=[0]*n
        ans=[]
        pop=0
        start=dict(zip(list(range(n-1)),list(range(1,n))))
        end=dict(zip(list(range(1,n)),list(range(n-1))))
        for u,v in queries:
            # print(record)
            cur_end=start[u]
            cur_start=end[v]
            if u in record or v in record:
                if cur_end<=v and cur_start>=u:
                    record.remove(cur_end)
                    node=start[cur_end]
                    while node!=v:
                        record.remove(node)
                        node=start[node]
                    start[u]=v
                    end[v]=u
                # cur_start=end[v]
                # if cur_start>u:
                #     record.remove(cur_start)
                #     node=end[cur_start]
                #     while node!=u:
                #         record.remove(node)
                #         node=end[node]
                #     start[u]=v
                #     end[v]=u
            ans.append(len(record)-1)
        return ans
